title: Game wont run on windows
body: I bought a new computer to run lol, downloaded it, ran it, it worked fine the first time after installation. closed the program down tried to run it a second time and now it wont run saying lol is not designed to run on windows or contains an error. I bought this computer to run lol and returned it the first time because this problem happened thinking it was the laptop, clearly not...

replies.body: Is your current OS set to 32-bit or 64?  You may need to [update to 64-bit](https://www.windowscentral.com/how-upgrade-32-bit-64-bit-version-windows-10), but definitely make sure your Windows is up to date as well.  A security setting may have messed up as well that's not accessing game files properly, but our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help add League as an exception.
